SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE sys_user SET User_ID=@@User_ID@@ <%=,User_Account=@@User_Account@@%> <%=,Password=@@Password@@%> <%=,User_Name=@@User_Name@@%> <%=,User_Status=@@User_Status@@%> <%=,Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@%> <%=,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@%> <%=,Update_User=@@Update_User@@%> WHERE User_ID=@@User_ID@@;

SELECT User_ID,User_Account,Password,User_Name,User_Status,Create_Time,Create_UserId,Create_User,Update_Time,Update_UserId,Update_User FROM sys_user WHERE 1=1 <%= AND User_ID=@@User_ID@@%> <%= AND User_Account=@@User_Account@@%> <%= AND Password=@@Password@@%> <%= AND User_Name=@@User_Name@@%> <%= AND User_Status=@@User_Status@@%> <R%= LIMIT @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM sys_user WHERE 1=1 <%= AND User_ID=@@User_ID@@%> <%= AND User_Account=@@User_Account@@%> <%= AND Password=@@Password@@%> <%= AND User_Name=@@User_Name@@%> <%= AND User_Status=@@User_Status@@%> ;
